General.Name: Hamilton Global Opportunities PLC
General.Description: Hamilton Global Opportunities PLC, an investment holding company, invests in last stage companies specialized in Tech, Fintech, and MedTech sectors in the United States and Israel. The company was formerly known as Hamilton Venture Capital Limited. Hamilton Global Opportunities PLC was incorporated in 2009 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Lansdown House, London, United Kingdom, W1J 6ER
